Class Flight

java.lang.Object
  Flight

public class Flight
extends Object

A flight which journeys from a point of departure to a destination.

Version:
1.0 2016-12-23
Author:
Maas Lalani, Jenisha Thomas, Ming Zhao Huang

Constructor Detail

Flight

public Flight()
Constructs a flight with the default characteristics.

Flight

public Flight(String flightName,
              double cost,
              String date,
              Location destination,
              Location departure,
              Plane plane)
Constructs a flight with the specified characteristics.

Parameters:
flightName - the name of this flight
pre-condition: flightName may not be null
cost - the cost of a single ticket in this flight
date - the time of the departure of this flight
pre-condition: date may not be null
destination - the destination of this flight
pre-condition: destination may not be null
departure - the departure of this flight
pre-condition: departure may not be null
plane - the plane in which this flight will take place
pre-condition: plane may not be null
